s: Summary: Pre‑Consensus side event spotlighting Hong Kong as a Web3 hub with networking, sponsor keynotes and swag.
Topics: RealFi Layer‑1, on‑chain marketplaces, token yield, ecosystem building.
Speakers: Founders from Pharos Network and ProdigyFi, plus sponsor panelists.
r: Gain early access to high‑value founder networks before the main conference.
Learn about inclusive financial infrastructure and on‑chain yield mechanisms.
Secure exclusive swag and brand visibility among regional innovators.
